mapper.select: SELECT A.i_board, A.seq, A.title, A.r_dt, A.hits, B.i_user, B.nm AS writer_nm, ifnull(C.favorite_cnt, 0) AS favorite_cnt, B.profile_img FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user LEFT JOIN (SELECT i_board, COUNT(i_board) AS favorite_cnt FROM t_board_favorite GROUP BY i_board) C ON A.i_board = C.i_board WHERE A.typ = #{typ} ORDER BY seq DESC

SELECT A.i_board, A.seq, A.typ, A.title, A.ctnt, A.r_dt, A.hits , B.i_user, B.nm AS writer_nm, ifnull(C.favorite_cnt, 0) AS favorite_cnt , CASE WHEN D.i_board IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS is_favorite, B.profile_img FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i_board, COUNT(i_board) AS favorite_cnt FROM t_board_favorite GROUP BY i_board ) C ON A.i_board = C.i_board LEFT JOIN t_board_favorite D ON A.i_board = D.i_board AND D.i_user = #{i_user} WHERE A.i_board = #{i_board}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_cmt ( i_board, i_user, ctnt ) VALUES (#{i_board}, #{i_user}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT A.i_cmt, A.i_board, A.ctnt, date_format(A.r_dt, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS r_dt , B.i_user, B.nm AS user_nm, B.profile_img AS user_img , CASE WHEN A.i_user = #{i_user} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END is_mycmt FROM t_board_cmt A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.i_board = #{i_board} ORDER BY i_cmt DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board_cmt WHERE i_cmt = #{i_cmt} AND i_user = #{i_user}
